text: Novozirikovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Zilim-Karanovsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 101 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 43 km from Krasnousolsky, 4 km from Zilim-Karanovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Novozirikovo
